title: Warring Kingdoms Garen Login Screen (FANMADE)
body:
3 weeks ago I made the lovely Championship Ashe Login Screen, and it was requested that I should do a Warring Kingdoms Garen Login Screen, so here I am with a brand new piece for you guys to enjoy, hope you like it. I spent about 2 days on this one so it looks pretty good imo, still a few noticeable cloth physics errors but my software doesn't actually have cloth simulation so I did it with homemade effect combos. Anyway, take a look!

replies.body:
does this hurt anybody else's eyes? The blurry movement just, makes my head hurt.

Good job though.

Ah very cool! This looks great, I love the vfx on his sword!
{{sticker:garen-swing}}

This is really fantastic. I'd love to see more of these.

A few notes on this one:

* The camera bobbing makes the whole thing hard to follow. I'd recommend keeping the background stationary.
* The character at the top of the steps moves a little too much. It's actually slightly distracting, especially since the work there isn't as good as it is on Garen himself, so the column keeps moving behind her.
* You didn't animate the two flags on either side of the staircase, which seems a little odd.

Other than that an a bit of blurriness, though, this is phenomenal.
Aside from the camera "bobbing" I really like this!

I'm really happy you do that.
Thank you again for responding to my request ^^
Can you link the cs ashe login?
